contentrichtext.text: '''XADS''' ('''Xtreme Alternative Defense Systems''') is a privately held firm in [[Anderson, Indiana]], [[USA]]. XADS is a producer of NLDEW (Non-lethal (less than lethal) [[directed energy weapon]]s) for protecting and defending in military operations, law enforcement, site security, and peacekeeping. XADS was founded in 2002 after a proposal was submitted to the [[United States Marine Corps]]. XADS is developing a short-range wireless [[electroshock weapon]] called [[StunStrike]]. Contracts have been awarded to XADS to provide new solutions to problems on the battlefield. XADS makes the Photonic Disruptor Series [http://www.xtremeads.com/photonic.htm]. It is called a Threat Assessment Laser Illuminator (TALI); but it can cause night-blindness and secondary effects such as [[nausea]]; it is claimed to leave no permanent eye damage. == PD/G 105 == The Photonic Disruptor/Green 105 mW laser illuminator is XADS's military grade laser. The laser runs off two AAA batteries and has a range of over 350 meters in darkness, with an operating life of 3000-5000 hours. The unit can be rail mounted for use with weapons. It is deployed in the field in Iraq and Afghanistan. ==See also== *[[StunStrike]] *[[Electrolaser#Xtreme Alternative Defense Systems]] ==External links== * http://www.xtremeads.com/ [[Category:Defense companies of the United States]] [[Category:Firearms manufacturers in the United States]] [[Category:Companies based in Indiana]] [[Category:Anderson, Indiana]]
